name: THE DIVING EQUIPMENT & MARKETING ASSOCIATION (DEMA)
description: Trade association representing the scuba diving industry
sampleDescriptions: Seeking amendments to Sec. 11503 - The Small Passenger Vessel Act (SPVA), which was included in the 2023 National Defense Authorization Act, to provide liability coverage and insurance premium relief
